venue.name: Harvard Law School, Wasserstein Hall, Room 4062

item.description: Hey everyone! I'm co-organizing a Wikipedia edit-a-thon in honor of Ada Lovelace Day on October 16th at Harvard Law School. The focus will be twofold: expanding and creating pages related to women in science, tech, engineering and math (STEM); and helping newbie Wikipedia editors learn the ropes and get excited about contributing. Full details at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Meetup/Ada_Lovelace_Edit-a-thon_-_Harvard
item.name: Ada Lovelace Day Women-in-STEM Wikipedia edit-a-thon
